title: Accardo
author: Accardo
created_time: December 07, 2023, 07:16:58 AMLast edit: December 07, 2023, 10:06:56 PM by Accardo
content: Hi ran out of tron and would need it asap to complete a transaction. We can discuss on how I'll pay back if you want. Anybody who owns tron pls help me out. Or any suggestion of how I can go about it is welcomed.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: If you have something on arbitrum/optimism/polygon or any other cheap chain, use instant exchange like simpleswap/stealthex (they have cheap minimum amount (~$5) to transact) and make swap to tron.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on December 07, 2023, 07:57:03 AMIf you have something on arbitrum/optimism/polygon or any other cheap chain, use instant exchange like simpleswap/stealthex (they have cheap minimum amount (~$5) to transact) and make swap to tron. Hi thanks for your help, I already got tron, would try this some other times when I need to trade tron again. The trc 20 network is quite a pain in the ass, wondering why both tron and usdt has same address, but contains different currency and I'm being warned not to send usdt to the same address meant for tron. While they're both the same.

comments.author: marbet85
